commit.message:
re PR tree-optimization/51070 (ICE verify_gimple failed)

2012-01-03  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	PR tree-optimization/51070

	Properly handle calls.

	* gcc.dg/torture/pr51070-2.c: New testcase.
